3.1.hd_quote: If you have the first line and you don't know that you are confused, then you are really confused.
3.1.behavioral_axis: Waits in introspection, accepts confusion as natural, lets life explain itself without forcing order or seeking external solutions.
3.1.shadow_axis: Denies confusion, thinks they know what is going on, forces premature order onto naturally chaotic beginnings.
3.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.2.hd_quote: The unrelenting energy for growth will eventually triumph.
3.2.behavioral_axis: Projects confused energy outward, attracts guidance from others, experiments with different directions until finding natural order through growth.
3.2.shadow_axis: Accepts and rejects authority simultaneously, gets conditioned by others' directions, cycles between following guides and resenting them.
3.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.3.hd_quote: In order to survive confusion, you have to be willing to make those mistakes.
3.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments through trial and error, recognizes what is fertile versus sterile, adapts and survives by making mistakes until finding what works.
3.3.shadow_axis: Refuses to mutate, denies evolutionary standards, becomes contrary and stuck despite repeated failures or harmful patterns.
3.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.4.hd_quote: These people are focused on being confused. That is their charisma.
3.4.behavioral_axis: Draws valued guidance through natural charisma, stays focused on confusion with one-track openness, allows others to provide solutions.
3.4.shadow_axis: Attracts manipulative guidance, becomes dependent on others to solve confusion, loses integrity by following unsuitable directions.
3.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.5.hd_quote: The courage to stand by one's convictions.
3.5.behavioral_axis: Stands by convictions despite others projecting confusion onto them, maintains individuality when others attempt to guide or fix them.
3.5.shadow_axis: Appeases others' projections, suffers victimization by letting external forces dominate their natural ordering process, alienates others trying to prove clarity.
3.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

3.6.hd_quote: The ultimate maturity to recognize when struggle is futile.
3.6.behavioral_axis: Surrenders to confusion without struggle, trusts that ordering comes naturally, observes the whole process from detached perspective.
3.6.shadow_axis: Falls into depression from overwhelming confusion, refuses to participate in life until perfect order appears, withdraws from mutative process entirely.
3.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
